summary: An ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2223 for improvement of the alley in block 122, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition being the alley between Spring and Madison Streets, and Minor and Summit Avenues, by paving the same with asphalt, under Ordinance No. 22514, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
